text: Læa tha cea di hen meux phu kratha phid thanghlay km sirsʹa khxng phwk khea lng n thi phracea khxng phwk khea (phlang klaw wa) “kha tæ phracea khxng rea rea di hen læw rea diyin læw khx di thrng pord sng rea klab pi (yang lok dun ya) pheux rea ca di kratha khwam di thæcring rea pen phu mi khwam cheux man læw (n badni)”
